title: Reblooming Blue
overview: When faced with unemployment and the death of a friend, Chen Xiaoman suddenly realized that he had missed many opportunities to choose life and returned to his hometown of Jingdezhen, where he met his betrayed and frustrated boss Ke Yan. The two saw each other's difficulties in their daily interactions, but they were unwilling to reveal each other's scars. While trying to hide their truest situation, they unconsciously found a trace of support in each other.
